title: Tavarish Hernandez & and Jared Pink (Wrench Everyday)
description:
It's the Real Tavarish and Jared Pink! Freddy is known for two things: 1. CarTrek and 2. buying used supercars - some in amazing states of disrepair - and rebuilding them to drivable, sell-able condition. He's done it with an Aston, a McLaren, various Mercedes, a Bentley, Ferrari, and more. He has lots of projects, lots of dreams, and has had some amazing mechanical adventures.  

Jared is Freddy's right-hand man and co-host on Wrench Everyday. He's helped Freddy repair all kinds of weird things and has barrels of mechanical wisdom.

Visit talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month when you use promo code TIRE at sign-up. 

Go to blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200. 

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store. 

Sign up for your trial at Noom.com/TIRE.

Want early access to this episode? To watch the live stream? Bonus shows, or ad-free shows? Join our Patreon!  Go to https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast and check out the tiers. It all starts at just $3/month!
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (tavarish, freddy hernandez)
